alert.note: Alert for Forrest; Lamar; Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued March 18 at 3:14AM CDT until March 19 at 9:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For Sunday morning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 33 possible. For Monday morning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 possible. * WHERE...Marion, Lamar and Forrest Counties. * WHEN...For Sunday and Monday mornings. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
